pkgmetadata.longdescription:
mt32emu is a module of the Munt project. It produces a C++ static link library named libmt32emu which provides classes to emulate (approximately) the Roland MT-32, CM-32L and LAPC-I synthesiser modules.
This library is intended for developers wishing to integrate an MT-32 emulator into a driver or an application. A cross-platform UI-enabled application is available in the Munt project and uses this library: mt32emu_qt.
